rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I just remembered an old story
my grandma told me once.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It was about a man called Ephem,
known as the First Emperor.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Ephem journeyed across the lands to
build up his own legacy, and on his
way, he met someone named Carraig.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0004
rows.name:
The stories aren't clear on who Carraig
actually was - male or female, a Divine
Beast or a scientist, a Blade or a Driver...

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0005
rows.name:
But at any rate, Ephem journeyed with
Carraig until they reached this Divine
Beast, where they founded Superbia.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Ephem's son followed in his father's
footsteps, uniting the nearby nations
and turning Superbia into an Empire.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0007
rows.name:
...Superbia has the longest history
of any nation in this area.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0008
rows.name:
So I suppose it's only natural
that our Divine Beast's life
will end sooner or later.

rows.label: tlk45420151_04_msg0009
rows.name:
Even so, I worry that we're placing too
much strain on our Divine Beast right
now... That can't be good for anyone.
